actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-1262.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 7020 to amend the Solid Waste Disposal Act to provide authorities to respond to releases of hazardous waste from inactive hazardous waste sites which endanger public health and the environment, to establish a Hazardous Waste Response Fund to be funded by a system of fees, to establish prohibitions and requirements concerning inactive hazardous waste sites, to provide for liability of persons responsible for releases of hazardous waste at such sites, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 7020 (waste disposal).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 7020 to amend the Solid Waste Disposal Act to provide authorities to respond to releases of hazardous waste from inactive hazardous waste sites which endanger public health and the environment, to establish a Hazardous Waste Response Fund to be funded by a system of fees, to establish prohibitions and requirements concerning inactive hazardous waste sites, to provide for liability of persons responsible for releases of hazardous waste at such sites, and for other purposes.
